name: George Lang's Honey-Poppy Seed "Salami"
keywords: dessert, honey, poppy seed, walnut, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Bring honey to a boil, preferably in top of double boiler.
Add remaining ingredients and blend well. Let cool.
Put mixture on cold marble slab and roll into salami-shaped cylinder. Roll cylinder in wax paper and chill thoroughly. Serve sliced.
